'''Berthot''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor that lived during the [[Age of Discovery]].
document_data.History: Berthot developed three spells during their life. The spells they invented were ''[[fumble]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2710|NY}}, ''[[screen]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2730|NY}}, and finally, ''[[chaos]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2754|NY}}.
